downloadTitle: BizTalk Server Accelerator for SWIFT - Message Pack 2020 Update
downloadDescription: 2020 Update for BizTalk A4Swift Message Pack 2019
detailsSection:
2020 Update for BizTalk A4Swift Message Pack 2019.

This update installs the flat-file (MT) messaging schemas and policies used by Microsoft BizTalk Accelerator for SWIFT to correspond to the SWIFT messaging standards for Service Release 2020.
This update also includes the fixes of Message Pack 2019 CU1.

Microsoft BizTalk Accelerator for SWIFT – Message Pack
Important Announcement

Going forward, Microsoft is planning to make the code for Message Pack publicly available on GitHub. We will encourage collaboration among the users and community in updating the schemas and validation policies as applicable. More details and specifics will be posted on https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/t5/biztalk-server/ct-p/BizTalkServer.
In this context, it is important to note that Message Pack 2020 is the last release driven and delivered by Microsoft.
systemRequirementsSection: Microsoft BizTalk Accelerator for SWIFT Message Pack 2019.
installInstructionSection:
The Microsoft BizTalk Accelerator for SWIFT Message Pack 2019 should be downloaded and installed successfully before installing this Update.

Run the downloaded .EXE from your hard drive and follow the instructions to complete the installation.
